|m=zài
|m-s=zai4/dai4/de4
|m-s_note=de4 - modal particle
|dg=зэ3
|c=zoi6
|c-t=doi5
|g=cai5
|h=pfs=chhai/chhôi/n:ti/n:tu/n:tui/n:to/n:chhi/s:thê/s:thî/s:tî/s:chhî/chhô/chhok;gd=cai4/coi1/hoi1/hoi4
|h_note=Sixian: chhai - literary; chhôi - colloquial; ti/tu/tui/to/chhi/thê/thî/tî/chhî/chhô/chhok - colloquial (probably substitute)
Meixian: cai4 - literary; coi1 - colloquial; hoi1/hoi4 - colloquial (preposition, also written as {{zh-l|*嗨}} or {{zh-l|*喺}})
|j=zai3
|mb=cài
|md=câi
|mn=xm,zz,tw:chāi/qz:chǎi
|mn-t=do6/zai6
|mn-t_note=do6 - colloquial; zai6 - literary
|w=3ze
|x=dou5/zai5/zai4
|x_note=dou5 - colloquial (preposition); zai5 - colloquial; zai4 - literary
|mc=y
|oc=y
|ma=y
|cat=adv,prep,v
}}
